> <OLD>
>
> Tucson dismounts from the wave of water and lands with a heavy foot in front
>  of Dark Rodimus, and stands with poised solidarity.  His expression as wise
> as the one on Master Yoketron's face whenever he was challenged by students
> who felt he was a bit of a pushover.
>
> " Is that what you believe, Hot Rod?  Have you ever engaged me formally in
> combat?  And have you ever really seen beyond what your eyes see now?  I
> will not believe your words until you have proven that to me, face to face.
> One  can never fully assume until he has proven himself in valid combat.  So
> I take it you are challenging me.  In that case, I accept.  But be prepared,
> I am NOT as predictable as you think I am."
>
> He takes a walk around Rodimus, waiting for his reaction.

> <OLD>
>
> nightlight started to wake up but she felt weak and an overhelming pain

<NEW>

Walking around DARK RODIMUS entailed walking around the the force
shield that at the moment protected him as well as the others. On the
other side of the shield other soldiers are also appearing out of the
cave opening on the other side of the shield.

SHARKTICONS stepped out, accompanied by their dreaded master SKYBYTE.
Then there are soldiers who look like various forms of dinosaurs, all
of them heavily armored. They would not be push overs in a fight.

NIGHTLIGHT was in a corner tucked away by DARK RODIMUS. Next to her
were the inert forms of STAMPY and SHARPEDGE.

STAMPY's foot twitched slightly, but he made no other sound or movement.

Meanwhile near the edge of the shield DARK RODIMUS turned to look at
TUSCON an almost feral smile on his face, "You have no idea what I'm
capable of either." He said in menacing tones. "You think your master
Yokatron is the only one." He chuckled. "He was just an old fool."

Even as DARK RODIMUS was speaking MAGMATRON turned to glance at DARK
RODIMUS. "Quiet!" He said "and prepare, battle is coming!"

At the same time there was a rumbling sound as the whole chamber began
to shake! The fire that had been bathing OPTIMUS in yellow and orange
energies began to shift and turn colors!

"What the slag?" SABERBACK said as he turned to gape as the pillar of
flame like energies turned crimson red and then jet black, the fire
sweeping over OPTIMUS.

The whole chamber began to shake is great cracks appeared along the floor!

From above the Stalactites began to drop to the ground like huge
spears, crashing to the floor. The water that had been rushing into
the room began to fall into the fissures that were opening up looking
like miniature waterfalls!

The shield itself began to buckle and flicker as the disruptive
energies flowed through it as well. Jagged black energy flowed through
the once translucent energy of the shield, at the same time the
blackened energy flowed along OPTIMUS' frame, flickering between
himself, MAGMATRON, the shield and then back to OPTIMUS himself.

OPTIMUS made no movement, no response as his very armor darkened as if
being burned!

Meanwhile the surrounding shield flickered once and then a second time
and then finally there was the sound of a pop and then the shield
dropped.

(TAG)

- Preston
